inclusion.criterion: Adult ≥ 18 year old and medically stable
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Reduced bone mineral density at least one SD lower than normal level for the same age and gender (T-score < -1)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Poor or unstable graft function (creatinine >200 lmol/L)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Risk for osteosarcoma, such as Paget's disease of the bone
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy.
